name: hansei-bot
description: Hansei Cyber Security High School Discord Bot
author: HanSeo0507 <khan3618@naver.com>

scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon --exec "ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register --files src/index.ts" --watch src -e ts
scripts.prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register --files src/index.ts --watch src -e ts
